continuousQueries: select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^CONTAINER\..*$/ group by time(1m) into MIN.:series_name
select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^MIN\.CONTAINER\..*$/ group by time(5m) into 5MIN.:series_name
select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^5MIN\.MIN\.CONTAINER\..*$/ group by time(15m) into 15MIN.:series_name
select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^15MIN\.5MIN\.MIN\.CONTAINER\..*$/ group by time(1h) into HOUR.:series_name
select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^PLANET\..*$/ group by time(1m) into MIN.:series_name
